episodes.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 392 (2.24.2017)
episodes.summary: Brad and Spearsy wrap up The 80s Cruise one final time. But hey, there are also fresh seggies for the second half of the show! And some trivia questions!

episodes.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 391 (2.16.2017)
episodes.summary: Oh my god! What have you missed? Everything! Morris Day! Cheap Trick! Playing Star Trek trivia with Information Society. Find out what else.

episodes.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 390 (2.14.2017)
episodes.summary: The cruise is halfway over?!? That's not possible. We have stories on Tom Bailey, Howard Jones and Terri Nunn in one of the greatest shows we've ever seen.

episodes.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 389 (2.13.2017)
episodes.summary: Were the VJs drunk? How did Tom Bailey sound on Night One? And what else crazy is happening on The '80s Cruise? We answer all this and more.

episodes.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 388 (2.9.2017)
episodes.summary:
Steve, Brad, and guest host Jen talk about our favorite couples of the 1980s - our favorite fictional couples, our favorite real-life couples, and our favorite crushes.

Plus full seggies!

episodes.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 387 (1.20.2017)
episodes.summary: With a new year upon us, Brad and Steve look back at the movies, music and TV shows that made news 30 years ago. Plus seggies!

episodes.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 386 (12.31.2016)
episodes.summary: Our annual Bloopers Show hopefully puts an end to 2016.

episodes.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 385 (12.26.2016)
episodes.summary: When you can't find the words to honor a beloved icon, borrow his. Thanks for lending yours to us, George Michael.

episodes.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 384 (12.22.2016)
episodes.summary: Our hosts go dark this holiday season with their top 5 favorite "dark" holiday movies. Plus the darkest PPTMN ever!

episodes.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 383 (12.17.2016)
episodes.summary: Thirty years ago, pop culture faced its biggest crisis to date. Three decades later, we tell the tale.

episodes.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 382 (11.22.2016)
episodes.summary: Time to revisit one of our favorite holiday podcasts from 2006 while still giving you fresh seggies!

episodes.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 381 (11.9.2016)
episodes.summary:
No political parties. No campaign signs. Only winners in this special "Reunification" show where we aim to find common ground for '80s Nation.

BONUS LINK:  Here's a YouTube playlist with all the music from this show

episodes.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 380 (11.6.2016)
episodes.summary:
The gang honors three more albums that they connected with in 1986, including gems from XTC, Queen and the Smithereens. Plus full seggies.


BONUS LINK:  Here's a Spotify playlist with the albums we discuss!

episodes.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 379 (10.25.2016)
episodes.summary:
No, we haven't been meditating all month - just wrestling with a crocodile of a technical problem.  But we're BAAAACK with a quick look at this week's '80s news!

Join Steve, Brad, and guest host Jen to hear what solutions we can provide to your paltry costume-related dilemmas, and to find out how much mad cash the boys in Spinal Tap have made in royalties.

episodes.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 378 (9.25.2016)
episodes.summary: Dane Butcher, the master of ceremonies onboard The '80s Cruise, joins us to talk about the 2016 trip and to give us the scoop on the 2017 voyage. Plus, full seggies and a new finale idea.

episodes.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 377 (9.11.2016)
episodes.summary: Lots of time to record, so little news to talk about. Wait. Strike that. Reverse it.

episodes.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 376 (8.21.2016)
episodes.summary: Eighties pop princess Tiffany joins the show to talk about the early days of MTV, why she's coming back to the '80s Cruise in 2017 and the reason she never went to prom in the '80s. Plus full seggies!

episodes.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 375 (8.7.2016)
episodes.summary: We discover four more '80s classics that weren't originally from the '80s. Plus the craziest podcast time machine letter to date. Guest hosts include Just Drew and Gayle in DC.

episodes.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 374 (8.1.2016)
episodes.summary: A Stuck in the '80s moment in time. Brad and Spearsy reflect on possibly the most important moment in '80s pop culture history.

episodes.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 373  (7.20.2016)
episodes.summary: Are you planning on seeing the new Ghostbusters movie? Brad, Jen and Spearsy did on opening weekend and give their report. Plus, full seggies.

episodes.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 372 (7.3.2016)
episodes.summary: You won't believe the movies that SOME hosts think are bad. Be ready to sound off after listening to Brad, Drew, Jen and Steve on this week's weird topic. Plus full seggies and news about '80s In The Sand, a new '80s vacation to Punta Cana in 2017.

episodes.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 371 (6.18.2016)
episodes.summary: We wrap up some news this week on Highlander, Ferris Bueller and more. Plus, we reveal the Theme Nights for the 2017 '80s Cruise. And another podcast time machine letter for reader mailbag.

episodes.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 370 (6.5.2016)
episodes.summary: Spearsy, Brad, Drew and Jen each pick a personal fave album that turns 30 years old this year. Plus a mysterious fan letter recently uncovered after sitting at the bottom of our inbox for six years!

episodes.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 369 (6.3.2016)
episodes.summary: Steve and Brad try out a new format for album reviews - starting with ABC's new record "Lexicon of Love II."

episodes.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 368 (5.28.2016)
episodes.summary: Top Gun is 30 years old?!? Guess it's time to buzz the tower with special guest "Jeff in Cuba." Let's decide once and for all whether this movie lives up to its hype.

episodes.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 367 (5.11.2016)
episodes.summary: Everyone's favorite Valley Girl, Deborah Foreman, is back to talk about the 30th anniversary of April Fools Day and her adventures with online dating. Warning: This show contains some profanity that, while adult in nature, was far too cute for us to bleep.

episodes.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 366 (4.30.2016)
episodes.summary: How do you take the life of an artist like Prince and condense it into a podcast? You can't. But with the help of Brad in LA, Dr. Dim and Jen with One N, we still try to drown the tears by standing in the purple rain.

episodes.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 365 (4.23.2016)
episodes.summary: So much new to cover! Plus, we have the saddest Podcast Time Machine letter ever. And we have a fresh new "Let's Get Trivial" seggie with Eric from Cincinnati. And Spearsy forgot to ask him about chili!

episodes.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 364 (4.03.2016)
episodes.summary: We honor new renditions of classics by Modern English, The Cure, Hall & Oates, Young Fresh Fellows and more in this episode, which features the first appearance of guest co-host "Gayle in DC." And just you wait for the saddest reader mailbag letter ever.

episodes.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 363 (3.20.2016)
episodes.summary: We have a new seggie starting this episode - Let's Get Trivial - and if you play along with us, you'll have an edge for next year's trivia sessions on The '80s Cruise. Also, news on AC/DC, a Beetlejuice sequel, Ghostbusters and Ferris Fest. Plus, the long-awaited answers to the seggies from way, way back in February.

episodes.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 362 (3.6.2016)
episodes.summary: The first ever The '80s Cruise might be over, but it went out with a bang. We review Naked Eyes, Wang Chung, Jessie's Girl and give you the scoop on the 2017 cruise.

episodes.title: Stuck in the 80s Episode 361 (3.5.2016)
episodes.summary: We review Movie Costume Night, Richard Marx and much on the final day of The '80s Cruise.

episodes.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 358 (3.1.2016)
episodes.summary: It's Day 2 onboard the '80s Cruise as Steve and Brad report all the amazing details and mischief on the Holland America Eurodam.

episodes.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 357 (2.16.2016)
episodes.summary:
Steve and Brad bring you a quick '80s News Now to tide you over until the start of long-awaited '80s Cruise, with updates on a One Crazy Summer sequel, the summer concert tour lineup, and good news about Rick Springfield's new album.


All this, and seggies too!

CLICK HERE to listen to this week's show!

episodes.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 356 (2.7.2016)
episodes.summary: For this year's Valentine's Day show, we honor the movie "Somewhere in Time," featuring guest co-host Carol Janssen.

episodes.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 355 (1.24.2016)
episodes.summary: As we near the 30th anniversary, Steve and Brad discuss 1986's Challenger disaster in our first "Moment in Time" podcast.

episodes.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 354 (1.17.2016)
episodes.summary:
Steve and Brad discuss rags-to-riches, riches-to-rags, and the vagaries of the Frozen Concentrated Orange Juice commodities markets in our long-awaited review of 1983's Trading Places.  "We are moving, we are moving!"

All that plus a full slate of seggies!

episodes.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 353 (12.22.2015)
episodes.summary: Steve and Brad talk about the year's high points and share the outtakes from 2015 in this year's "Stocking Stuffer" episode.  Thanks for listening, and we'll see you in 2016!

Steve and Brad are joined by guest host Dr. Dim as we run through Rocky Balboa's life in the movies - from 1976's Rocky to the new release Creed.

Stick around for seggies and a reasonably difficult Rocky quiz.

CLICK HERE to listen to this week's show!

The '80s Cruise is just about three months away, so we check in with cruise director Dane Butcher for the inside scoop on what to expect. Plus, we have news on a shockingly amazing new discount on cabins. 

Also, items on a Top Gun sequel and the death of Captain EO. (He's not dead yet!)

CLICK HERE to listen to this week's show!

Steve and Brad talk about Back to the Future II - what it got right about the future, what it got wrong about the future, and where it fits into the BTTF multiverse.

It's heavy.

Stick around for some great reader mailbag letters and the story of a chance meeting of three original Stuck in the '80s hosts!

Stick around after all that pocket calculatoring for the seggies!

Steve sits down with Mike Score to talk about the classic New Wave band A Flock of Seagulls, including their US Festival set and his upcoming appearance on The '80s Cruise lineup.

episodes.summary: Ready for some Journey -- any way you want it? That's the way you need it. Times pop critic Sean Daly drops by to admire co-host Steve's concert t-shirt and to discuss the '80s arena rock phenomenon of Journey.

episodes.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 6 (8.25.05)
episodes.summary: Remember the movie Say Anything? John Cusack plays a character by which every girl would measure their boyfriends against. It's the first movie directed by genius film god Cameron Crowe, and it's -- dare we say -- a classic '80s flick. Also, a major Cusack fan stops by the studio to share her unwavering love for the heartthrob.

episodes.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 5 (8.19.05)
episodes.summary: Gabba gabba hey! Any Blitzkrieg Boppers out there? This is your week. Hosts Gina and Steve take on the Ramones, the pioneering band that helped create the American punk rock movement. A special guest shares his own Ramones tribute song.

episodes.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 4 (8.10.05)
episodes.summary: Happy anniversary, Sean Penn and Madonna! Almost. The movie and music icons of the '80s married 20 years ago this week. Hosts Gina and Steve, along with Times pop music critic Sean Daly, wonder how two stars with completely different personas hooked up in the first place and discuss how their careers changed after the divorce.

episodes.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 3 (8.04.05)
episodes.summary: The hosts chat about their love affair with Footloose, Kevin Bacon and Kenny Loggins' hit 1984 song. However, guest Steve Persall, the Times movie critic, sets them straight on how bad the movie is. The '80s songs are reason enough to tune into this podcast.

episodes.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 2 (7.28.05)
episodes.summary: Hosts Gina and Steve love tunes from the '80s, but they can't agree what to make of Paul Anka's new tribute album to the songs of their youth. Hear their arguments, listen to some song samples and decide for yourself: Paul Anka ... cool or bogus?

episodes.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 1 (7.22.05)
episodes.summary: In the first Stuck in the '80s episode, our hosts Gina and Steve discuss the glory days of high school, and the movie that defined and disrupted a generation, The Breakfast Club. Get in the know with movie trivia and interesting facts you definitely have forgotten.
